feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping product features to source files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing generated summaries for various frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables defining light/dark theme colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/components/deck/DeckNavigat: Slide navigation UI with previous/next controls and thumbnail list.
Main layout combining header, slide preview, navigation, image fields, and footer.
frontend/src/components/deck/ExportPptxB: Button that triggers HTML export of the presentation with loading and toast states.
frontend/src/components/deck/icons.tsx: Maps slide IDs to Lucide icons and provides a helper to retrieve the correct icon.
frontend/src/components/deck/imageUrlUti: Classifies image URLs, generates guidance/error messages, and supports export placeholder text based on URL validity.
frontend/src/components/deck/RemoteImage: Image component handling loading, validation guidance, and errors, preferring uploads when available.
frontend/src/components/deck/SlideCanvas: Renders slide content and images with academic theme, supporting uploaded screenshots for slide 11.
frontend/src/components/deck/SlideImageF: UI component for managing slide images, handling URL input, uploads, classification, and syncing state with the deck store.
frontend/src/components/deck/ThumbnailIt: Renders a clickable slide thumbnail with icon, title, and preview text, highlighting the active slide.
frontend/src/components/deck/useDeckStat: Zustand store managing current slide index and slide image data, including defaults and update/remove actions.
frontend/src/content/slides.ts: Defines static slide content including IDs, titles, bullet points, and slide types.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and exposing auth state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file exporting nothing as backend has no methods.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup and theme variables for light/dark modes with global base styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and rendering the app.
frontend/src/pptx/exportDeckToPptx.ts: Builds an HTML version of each slide with text and images and triggers a download as an .html file instead of a PPTX.
frontend/src/pptx/pptxgenjs.d.ts: Placeholder TypeScript declaration file for pptxgenjs with no content.
frontend/src/styles/deckTheme.ts: Exports a minimal white-and-blue academic slide theme defining colors, fonts, and spacing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, requirements, design constraints, and known issues for building the Kisan Sahayak slide deck system.
